themes: Innovative funding mechanisms for the arts
key_phrases: Tax the businesses who receive incentives
Art Donation block on the DMV forms
Wallspace in high end restaurants, bars, offices, and secure public places
artist’s data AND a way to make a donation
A reward concert for high dollar donations
Manual labor by artists who volunteer
barriers_identified: Limited funding sources for Austin Art and Music grants
Lack of artist visibility in high-end venues
solutions_proposed: Tax businesses who receive incentives to support the arts
Add an art donation option to DMV forms
Provide wallspace in high-end establishments for artists with donation options
Host a reward concert for high-dollar donors
Use dish lending library’s dishes for zero waste events
